title: Studio 10's Sarah Harris suffers a hilarious fashion fail on live TV
text:
Sarah Harris laughed off a major fashion fail during Thursday's episode of Studio 10.

The 38-year-old journalist had the rest of the panel in stitches as she realised her unfortunate gaffe.

Struggling to keep a straight face, she burst into giggles and admitted: 'I've just realised I've got my dress on back to front!'

Sarah later shared footage of the embarrassing moment to Instagram, proving that fashion disasters happen to the best of us.

The dress in question was a red sleeveless number that showed off her toned figure.

During the show, she pulled down the neck of her dress to show the tag to the camera and the rest of the Studio 10 panel.

'It's going to be a good day!' Studio 10's Sarah Harris (left) suffered a hilarious fashion fail on Thursday when she arrived on set with her dress on backwards

Kerri-Anne Kennerley and Angela Bishop couldn't help but giggle along, but Joe Hildebrand looked less than impressed.

Angela said: 'Your mic pack is where your boobs are supposed to be!'

Laughing off the mistake, Sarah said: 'It's going to be a good day today! I might need to change in the ad break.'

Whoops! During the show, she pulled down the neck of her dress to show the tag to the camera

Sharing a video of the gaffe to Instagram later on, she wrote: 'When you try to do fashion, but you're really just a dag who doesn’t deserve nice things.'

Sarah's fans certainly appreciated having a laugh at her expense, with several of them sharing stories of their own fashion fails.

One of her followers commented: 'Thanks for being so real Sarah. I've done this more than once myself.'
